item.description: Hi ladies! i have a second job over the weekends and have not been able to meetup. boo hoo. as a last minute get together, would anyone want to meet in andover at the mexican restaurant in downtown? i believe it is casa blanca, i will check name, or meet at marguerita's off exit 2 in salem, NH? i would love to get together this wednesday night around 6pm...any interest? my cell is 603-401-7185

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: go to mexican in andover, mass.
